title: I'm not even excited for Hextech Crafting for the free stuff.
body:
I'm excited for it for the increased mastery caps. I couldn't care less about free champs/skins because I only play and master a very small number of champs. It's hard to find a champ I actually enjoy playing. Before Jhin, the last champ that I just couldn't wait to play was Zed, and he was released in 2012...

Talon was the character that got me into the game to start with.
